paragraph.paragraph: This wizard enables you to create a Vision2 application with an advanced GUI. During the execution of the wizard, you will be able to design the interface for your Vision2 application.
paragraph.heading: 2Navigation
paragraph.paragraph: The wizard is comprised of five pages.
To navigate between the pages, use the Back and Next buttons provided on each page.
If you wish to cancel the wizard, you can select Cancel from any page.
To complete the wizard, select Finish from the final page.
paragraph.heading: 2Page Content
paragraph.paragraph: The wizard is comprised of the following pages:
paragraph.heading: 2Modifications
paragraph.paragraph:
Once a system has been generated, you may modify the GUI system that was created. For more information, click
/10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/10_Adding_A_New_Project/interactive_gui_project/completion.xml#modify Here
